table_description: Information about domain aliases in Google Workspace, including domain name, verification status, and aliases.

columns.name: kind
columns.description: The type or kind of the domain alias.

columns.name: domainName
columns.description: The domain name for the alias.

columns.name: verified
columns.description: Indicates whether the domain alias has been verified.

columns.name: etag
columns.description: The etag identifier for the resource.

columns.name: creationTime
columns.description: The timestamp when the domain alias was created.

columns.name: isPrimary
columns.description: Indicates whether this is the primary domain alias.
